title: Art Attack: Modo Desafio
overview: A group of young influencers with different artistic abilities – "Art Attackers" – face epic challenges that they must solve as a team. In each episode, the character Arti gives participants a mysterious box with the artistic challenge they must do. Each episode is a new adventure, and to reach their goal, Art Attackers must put all their knowledge to use and explore different artistic techniques. Through the assembly of prototypes, the team must think creatively, venturing into disciplines as diverse as traditional design, muralism, gastronomy, photography, sculpture and animation
